pta

Class DBM

  • java.lang.Object
    • pta.Zone
      • pta.DBM

  • public class DBM
extends Zone
    Implementation of the difference-bound matrix (DBM) data structure. Data structures and algorithms are mostly based on those from: Johan Bengtsson, Wang Yi: Timed Automata: Semantics, Algorithms and Tools. Lectures on Concurrency and Petri Nets 2003, LNCS volume 3098, pages 87-124, Springer, 2004

      protected PTA pta

      DBM(PTA pta)
      Construct an empty DBM (don't use this).
